message.content:
cs.DC, cs.CE, cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.LG. 

This paper discusses a mechanism for incentivizing cloud tenants to participate in demand response programs in data centers. It involves resource management and pricing strategies, which are typical topics in the Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC) sub-category. The paper also proposes a novel incentive mechanism that involves monetary rewards, which falls under the Game Theory (cs.GT) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. The proposed mechanism is evaluated using analytical and empirical methods, which are common in the Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science (cs.CE) sub-category. Finally, the paper presents results that demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed mechanism, which is a typical topic in the Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-category.
